When you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a Scrap token. This ability triggers only twice each turn. [i](It’s an artifact with no abilities.)[/i]
When you cast an artifact spell, you may salvage X, where X is that spell’s mana value. If you do, copy that spell. [i](To salvage X, sacrifice X artifacts. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
